description:
We’ve been waiting patiently all summer — even if it hasn’t officially begun yet — for news of The Originals. The Vampire Diaries spin-off snagged some of our favorite characters, and we’re dying to know what will happen with the supernatural siblings. Luckily, we should get some intel from the set soon, because the new CW show will begin filming in July.我们焦急地等待了整个夏天——虽然《The Originals》还没正式开播。作为《吸血鬼日记》的衍生剧，《The Originals》集合了其中不少颇受欢迎的角色，我们都很想知道在作为最古老的吸血鬼的兄弟姐妹之间的故事。幸好，我们知道这部剧很快就要开拍了。CW表示《The Originals》将会在7月正式开拍。

July 12, a Friday, is 23 days from now. We’re guessing everyone will fly into Atlanta, get settled over the weekend, and then start work on Monday, July 15. Hopefully by then Joseph Morgan will have wrapped up his work on Dermaphoria, the new movie he’s starring in. 7月12日，周五，里现在还有23天。相信那个时候所有演员都会飞到亚特兰大，在那里度过周末，并在7月15日的那个周一开始正式的拍摄工作。希望到那个时候男主角Joseph Morgan已经完成了他的电影新作《Dermaphoria》。

We can’t wait to see how the insanity is multiplied when they all get together! 我们已经等不及要看这些人在一起碰触的创作火花了！

title: 《吸血鬼日记》衍生剧《The Originals》7月15日开拍
